Text: do not upload duplicate torrents, previous uploads of this have been deleted.
Seriously, Why the FUCK won't this download?

...Well, *I* can't find it posted anywhere else, so howabout either a) leaving it alone, especially if b) you're not going to be arsed to post a valid, already posted link?

[shakes head in utter dismay]

...It wasn't directed at you, which is why it probably didn't make sense to you. On the other hand, it *did* address your inability to download this file, a problem I happen to share with you.

Trust me, if I were bitchslapping you, *you'd* know it. This wasn't such a case...

@ChingaTuu

My apologies, my frustration is showing with these people that upload something, and then disappear.  It's happening more frequently lately.  And of course, the uploader fails to address any complaints.
